segment.source: Device Portal for Xbox
segment.target: Device Portal for Xbox

segment.source: Learn how to enable the Device Portal for Xbox One.
segment.target: Learn how to enable the Device Portal for Xbox One.

segment.source: Device Portal for Xbox
segment.target: Device Portal for Xbox

segment.source: Set up Device Portal on Xbox
segment.target: Set up Device Portal on Xbox

segment.source: Enable Device Portal
segment.target: Enable Device Portal

segment.source: To enable Device Portal
segment.target: To enable Device Portal

segment.source: Select the Dev Home tile on the home screen (see image)
segment.target: Select the Dev Home tile on the home screen (see image)

segment.source: Device Portal DevHome
segment.target: Device Portal DevHome

segment.source: Within Dev Home, navigate to the Remote Management tool Device Portal RemoteManagement Tool
segment.target: Within Dev Home, navigate to the Remote Management tool Device Portal RemoteManagement Tool

segment.source: Select Manage Windows Device Portal and press A
segment.target: Select Manage Windows Device Portal and press A

segment.source: Check the Enable Windows Device Portal setting
segment.target: Check the Enable Windows Device Portal setting

segment.source: Enter a Username and Password to use to authenticate access to your devkit from a browser, and save them.
segment.target: Enter a Username and Password to use to authenticate access to your devkit from a browser, and save them.

segment.source: Close the settings page and note the URL listed on the Remote Management tool to connect.
segment.target: Close the settings page and note the URL listed on the Remote Management tool to connect.

segment.source: Enter the URL in your browser, and then sign in with the credentials you configured.
segment.target: Enter the URL in your browser, and then sign in with the credentials you configured.

segment.source: You will receive a warning about the Certificate that was provided, similar to that pictured below.
segment.target: You will receive a warning about the Certificate that was provided, similar to that pictured below.

segment.source: You should click on Continue to this website to access Windows Device Portal in the preview.
segment.target: You should click on Continue to this website to access Windows Device Portal in the preview.

segment.source: Device Portal Certificate Error
segment.target: Device Portal Certificate Error

segment.source: Device Portal pages
segment.target: Device Portal pages

segment.source: Device Portal on Xbox provides a set of standard pages.
segment.target: Device Portal on Xbox provides a set of standard pages.

segment.source: For detailed descriptions, see Windows Device Portal overview.
segment.target: For detailed descriptions, see Windows Device Portal overview.
